mapper.select: SELECT email, pw, name, phone, level, createTime, updateTime, accountNum, accountName, status FROM user WHERE email = #{email};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( email, pw, name, phone, level, createTime, updateTime, accountNum, accountName, status ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{level}, now(), now(), #{accountNum}, #{accountName}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET pw = #{pw}, updateTime = now() WHERE email = #{email}
UPDATE user SET email = 0, pw = 0, name = 0, phone = 0, level = 0, createTime = 0, updateTime = now(), accountNum = 0, accountName = 0, status = 0 WHERE email = #{email}
UPDATE user SET phone = #{phone}, updateTime = now(), accountNum = #{accountNum}, accountName = #{accountName} WHERE email = #{email}
